title: Initialize Vite + Lit + TypeScript project structure
description:
Create internal/tickboard/ui/ directory with:
- package.json with dependencies: lit@3.x, @shoelace-style/shoelace@2.x, vite@5.x
- vite.config.ts configured to output to ../server/static/
- tsconfig.json with strict mode and DOM libs
- index.html entry point
- src/main.ts entry point
- src/types/tick.ts with Tick interface matching existing API

Test: cd internal/tickboard/ui && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
acceptance_criteria: pnpm install succeeds without errors, pnpm run dev starts Vite on localhost:5173, tsc --noEmit passes
closed_reason: Created internal/tickboard/ui/ with Vite + Lit + TypeScript build pipeline. Files: package.json (lit@3.x, shoelace@2.x, vite@5.x), vite.config.ts (outputs to ../server/static/, copies Shoelace icons), tsconfig.json (strict mode, decorators), index.html (Catppuccin/Shoelace theming), src/main.ts (Shoelace imports, base path), src/types/tick.ts (Tick interface matching API). Verified: pnpm install, pnpm dev, pnpm build all work.
